Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Cardano Founder Charles Hoskinson Shows Interest in Bringing Ripple‚Äôs RLUSD to Cardano
Î≥∏Î¨∏: In a significant development within the blockchain ecosystem, Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson has expressed interest in integrating Ripple‚Äôs RLUSD stablecoin into the Cardano blockchain . This announcement comes following technical and business discussions between Hoskinson and Ripple‚Äôs CTO David Schwartz and CEO Brad Garlinghouse, as reported by the Angry Crypto Show on X. The potential collaboration highlights the growing synergy between major blockchain platforms and stablecoin projects, aiming to enhance interoperability and expand the utility of digital assets. Overview of the Potential Integration Charles Hoskinson , the visionary behind Cardano, recently engaged in detailed discussions with Ripple executives, signaling a possible collaboration to bring RLUSD , Ripple‚Äôs U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin, to the Cardano blockchain. Hoskinson referred to RLUSD as a ‚Äúmajor win‚Äù for XRP, emphasizing its stability and potential to facilitate seamless transactions within the Cardano ecosystem. Key Highlights: Technical Synergy: Both Cardano and Ripple are renowned for their robust technical foundations and commitment to scalability and security. The integration of RLUSD could leverage Cardano‚Äôs Ouroboros consensus mechanism to ensure efficient and secure transactions. Business Strategy: Ripple‚Äôs expertise in facilitating cross-border payments aligns with Cardano‚Äôs mission to provide decentralized solutions for financial inclusion. Combining RLUSD with Cardano could open new avenues for global transactions and financial services. Background of Cardano and Ripple Collaboration Cardano‚Äôs Vision Cardano, founded by Charles Hoskinson, is a third-generation blockchain platform that prioritizes sustainability, scalability, and interoperability. Known for its research-driven approach and peer-reviewed protocols, Cardano aims to provide a secure and scalable infrastructure for decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts. Ripple‚Äôs Role in the Crypto Space Ripple, through its XRP Ledger, has established itself as a leader in facilitating fast and cost-effective cross-border payments. RLUSD, Ripple‚Äôs stablecoin, is designed to provide the stability of fiat currencies combined with the efficiency of blockchain technology, making it an ideal asset for transactions and financial services. The Significance of RLUSD Integration into Cardano Enhancing Interoperability Integrating RLUSD into Cardano can significantly enhance interoperability between different blockchain networks. This interoperability can facilitate the seamless transfer of assets and data, fostering a more interconnected and efficient blockchain ecosystem. Expanding Use Cases With RLUSD on Cardano, users can leverage the stablecoin for a variety of applications, including: Decentralized Finance (DeFi): RLUSD can be utilized in lending, borrowing, and trading platforms within Cardano‚Äôs DeFi ecosystem. Cross-Border Transactions: The stability of RLUSD combined with Cardano‚Äôs scalability can streamline international payments and remittances. Smart Contracts: RLUSD can be integrated into smart contracts, enabling more sophisticated and stable financial instruments. Boosting Financial Inclusion The collaboration can drive financial inclusion by providing accessible and stable financial services to underserved populations. Cardano‚Äôs focus on developing nations aligns with Ripple‚Äôs mission to enhance global financial infrastructure. Statements from Key Stakeholders Charles Hoskinson‚Äôs Perspective In his statement on X, Hoskinson emphasized the strategic importance of integrating RLUSD into Cardano. He stated, ‚ÄúBringing RLUSD to Cardano is a step forward in creating a more inclusive and efficient financial ecosystem. Ripple‚Äôs expertise in stablecoins complements Cardano‚Äôs robust infrastructure, paving the way for innovative financial solutions.‚Äù Ripple‚Äôs Leadership Insights Ripple‚Äôs CEO, Brad Garlinghouse, echoed Hoskinson‚Äôs optimism, highlighting the mutual benefits of the collaboration. ‚ÄúCardano‚Äôs dedication to scalability and security makes it an ideal partner for RLUSD. Together, we can enhance the utility and reach of stablecoins, driving greater adoption and integration into everyday financial activities.‚Äù Technical Considerations for Integration Smart Contract Compatibility For RLUSD to function seamlessly on Cardano, ensuring compatibility with Cardano‚Äôs smart contract platform is crucial. This involves: Adapting RLUSD Protocols: Modifying RLUSD protocols to align with Cardano‚Äôs smart contract capabilities. Security Audits: Conducting thorough security audits to ensure that RLUSD integration does not introduce vulnerabilities. Scalability and Transaction Efficiency Cardano‚Äôs Ouroboros consensus mechanism offers high scalability and low transaction fees, which can enhance RLUSD‚Äôs usability for large-scale transactions and applications. Cross-Chain Bridges Developing cross-chain bridges between Cardano and Ripple‚Äôs XRP Ledger can facilitate the smooth transfer of RLUSD and other assets, ensuring interoperability and liquidity across networks. Potential Benefits for the Crypto Ecosystem Increased Liquidity The introduction of RLUSD into Cardano can increase liquidity within the Cardano ecosystem, making it easier for users to engage in various financial activities without facing significant slippage or liquidity constraints. Enhanced User Experience Stablecoins like RLUSD provide users with a stable medium of exchange, reducing the volatility typically associated with cryptocurrencies. This stability can enhance the user experience, making it more appealing for everyday transactions and long-term investments. Strengthened Market Position The collaboration can strengthen both Cardano and Ripple‚Äôs market positions by combining their strengths and expanding their respective ecosystems. This synergy can attract more developers, investors, and users to both platforms. Challenges and Considerations Regulatory Compliance Navigating the regulatory landscape is a critical challenge. Both Cardano and Ripple must ensure that RLUSD integration complies with relevant financial regulations, including anti-money laundering (AML) and know your customer (KYC) requirements. Technological Integration Ensuring seamless technological integration requires careful planning and execution. Potential challenges include: Interoperability Issues: Addressing any compatibility issues between Cardano‚Äôs and Ripple‚Äôs technologies. Security Risks: Mitigating risks associated with cross-chain transactions and smart contract vulnerabilities. Market Adoption Achieving widespread adoption of RLUSD on Cardano depends on: User Awareness: Educating users about the benefits and uses of RLUSD within the Cardano ecosystem. Incentives: Providing incentives for developers and businesses to integrate and utilize RLUSD in their applications and services. Expert Opinions and Analysis Blockchain Analysts‚Äô Views Blockchain analysts view the potential integration of RLUSD into Cardano as a positive development that can enhance the functionality and appeal of both platforms. They highlight the complementary strengths of Cardano‚Äôs scalable infrastructure and Ripple‚Äôs stablecoin technology as key factors that could drive successful collaboration. Financial Experts‚Äô Insights Financial experts emphasize the importance of stablecoins in bridging the gap between traditional finance and decentralized finance (DeFi). RLUSD‚Äôs integration into Cardano could facilitate the creation of innovative financial products and services, further blurring the lines between centralized and decentralized financial systems. Developer Community Perspectives The developer community is optimistic about the possibilities that RLUSD integration brings. Developers see opportunities to create new dApps and financial instruments that leverage the stability of RLUSD and the scalability of Cardano, potentially driving significant innovation within the blockchain space. Comparative Analysis: Stablecoin Integrations Across Blockchains Tether on Ethereum and Tron Tether (USDT) has been successfully integrated into multiple blockchain platforms, including Ethereum and Tron. These integrations have enhanced USDT‚Äôs liquidity and accessibility, enabling its use in various DeFi applications and cross-chain transactions. USDC on Solana and Avalanche USD Coin (USDC) has also expanded its reach by integrating with high-performance blockchains like Solana and Avalanche. These integrations have improved transaction speeds and reduced fees, making USDC a preferred stablecoin for many users and developers. Lessons for Cardano and Ripple The successful integrations of Tether and USDC provide valuable lessons for Cardano and Ripple. Key takeaways include: Robust Technical Infrastructure: Ensuring that the underlying blockchain can handle high transaction volumes and maintain security. Strategic Partnerships: Collaborating with key players in the blockchain and financial sectors to drive adoption. Community Engagement: Actively engaging with the developer and user communities to foster innovation and support adoption. Future Outlook: The Path Ahead for Cardano and Ripple Roadmap for Integration The path forward involves several critical steps to ensure the successful integration of RLUSD into Cardano: Technical Development: Finalizing the technical aspects of RLUSD integration, including smart contract deployment and cross-chain bridge establishment. Testing and Audits: Conducting comprehensive testing and security audits to ensure the stability and security of the integrated system. Launch and Promotion: Officially launching RLUSD on Cardano and promoting its adoption through marketing campaigns and partnerships. Potential Milestones Q1 2025: Completion of technical integration and security audits. Q2 2025: Launch of RLUSD on the Cardano mainnet. Q3 2025: Introduction of RLUSD-based financial products and services within the Cardano ecosystem. Q4 2025: Assessment of integration success and exploration of further collaborations. Long-Term Vision The long-term vision for Cardano and Ripple includes creating a seamless and interoperable blockchain ecosystem where stablecoins like RLUSD play a central role in facilitating secure, efficient, and inclusive financial transactions. This vision aligns with the broader goals of enhancing financial inclusion, promoting economic growth, and driving technological innovation. Conclusion The Cardano brings Ripple‚Äôs RLUSD initiative represents a significant milestone in the evolving relationship between major blockchain platforms and stablecoin projects. By potentially integrating RLUSD into the Cardano blockchain, Charles Hoskinson and Ripple‚Äôs leadership aim to create a more interconnected and robust financial ecosystem that leverages the strengths of both platforms. This collaboration holds the promise of enhancing interoperability, expanding use cases, and driving greater financial inclusion. However, the success of this integration hinges on overcoming challenges related to regulatory compliance, technological compatibility, and market adoption. As the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, strategic partnerships like the one between Cardano and Ripple will play a crucial role in shaping the future of digital finance. By fostering innovation and collaboration, these initiatives can drive the mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies and unlock new opportunities for investors, developers, and users alike. Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Another European Country Has Made Legal Arrangements to Become a Cryptocurrency Center! Here Are the Details
Î≥∏Î¨∏: The Czech Republic has enacted a series of sweeping financial market reforms aimed at positioning itself as a leading destination for cryptocurrency and blockchain innovation. Czech Republic Implementing Financial Reforms to Become a Leading Crypto Hub This legislative move will remove key barriers for crypto firms and investors, boosting their appeal in the country‚Äôs fast-growing digital finance sector. Main Features of the Reformation The new legislation enables cryptocurrency businesses and investors to open bank accounts without unnecessary restrictions, removing a long-standing operational hurdle for the industry. This change is expected to facilitate financial transactions, provide stability, and stimulate growth for crypto businesses in the Czech Republic. Another important aspect is the three-year tax exemption period for crypto investments. This measure aligns crypto taxation with traditional assets like stocks, providing a more predictable and favorable tax environment for investors. Deputy Speaker of Parliament Jan Skopeƒçek, one of the leading advocates of the reforms, emphasised the role of the reforms in retaining high-value businesses in the Czech Republic. Skopeƒçek noted the importance of leveraging the country‚Äôs strong talent pool and innovative blockchain companies to remain competitive in the evolving global digital economy. ‚ÄúThese reforms remove unnecessary barriers and provide clarity for businesses and investors, ensuring the Czech Republic remains a top choice for crypto innovation,‚Äù Skopeƒçek said. The reforms come as the European Union prepares for the next phase of its Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) regulation, which comes into force on December 30. MiCA aims to harmonize crypto regulations across EU member states, but uneven grace periods and bureaucratic hurdles have created challenges for companies operating within the bloc. By implementing these proactive measures, the Czech Republic has the opportunity to attract both domestic and international investors, potentially outpacing neighboring countries in crypto adoption and innovation. *This is not investment advice. Exploring the Intersection of Cryptocurrency and Poker: A New Era in Gaming
Î≥∏Î¨∏: In recent years, the world of online gaming has witnessed a transformative shift with the integration of cryptocurrency, particularly in the realm of poker. This fusion of digital currency and traditional card games has not only revolutionized how players engage with poker but has also introduced a new level of excitement and innovation to the gaming industry. As cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum continue to gain traction, their influence on poker platforms is becoming increasingly significant. This article researches into the dynamic intersection of cryptocurrency and poker, exploring how this new era is reshaping the gaming landscape. The Rise of Crypto Poker Platforms: Revolutionizing Online Gaming The advent of crypto poker platforms has marked a significant turning point in the online gaming industry. These platforms have emerged as a popular choice for poker enthusiasts, offering a unique blend of traditional poker gameplay with the modern advantages of cryptocurrency. By leveraging digital currencies, these platforms provide players with a seamless and secure gaming experience, free from the constraints of traditional banking systems. This has opened up new opportunities for players worldwide, allowing them to participate in poker games without the usual geographical and financial barriers. One of the key factors driving the popularity of crypto poker platforms is the enhanced level of privacy and security they offer. Unlike conventional online poker sites, which require players to disclose personal and financial information, crypto platforms allow users to maintain anonymity. This is particularly appealing to players who value their privacy and wish to keep their gaming activities discreet. Additionally, the use of blockchain technology ensures that all transactions are transparent and immutable, further enhancing the security of these platforms. Moreover, the integration of cryptocurrency into poker platforms has introduced a new level of innovation and excitement to the game. Players can now enjoy faster transactions, lower fees, and access to a global pool of opponents. This has not only increased the competitiveness of online poker but has also attracted a new generation of players who are eager to probe the possibilities offered by digital currencies. As a result, crypto poker platforms are rapidly gaining traction, reshaping the landscape of online gaming and setting the stage for a new era of poker. Bitcoin and Ethereum: The Preferred Currencies for Poker Enthusiasts Among the myriad of cryptocurrencies available today, Bitcoin and Ethereum have emerged as the preferred choices for poker enthusiasts. Their widespread acceptance and robust infrastructure make them ideal for use in online poker platforms. Bitcoin, being the first and most well-known cryptocurrency, offers players a reliable and secure means of conducting transactions. Its decentralized nature ensures that players can enjoy a level of financial freedom and autonomy that is unmatched by traditional currencies. Ethereum, on the other hand, brings a unique set of advantages to the table. Known for its smart contract capabilities, Ethereum allows for the creation of decentralized applications (dApps) that can automate various aspects of the poker gaming experience. This includes everything from managing player funds to ensuring fair play through automated processes. The flexibility and versatility of Ethereum make it a popular choice among poker platforms looking to innovate and enhance their offerings. Platforms like GGPoker have embraced these cryptocurrencies, recognizing their potential to revolutionize the online poker experience. By integrating Bitcoin and Ethereum into their systems, these platforms offer players a seamless and efficient way to engage with the game. The use of these digital currencies not only streamlines the transaction process but also provides players with a level of security and transparency that is crucial in the world of online gaming. As more poker enthusiasts turn to Bitcoin and Ethereum, the influence of these cryptocurrencies on the gaming industry is set to grow even further. Blockchain Technology: Ensuring Fair Play and Transparency in Poker The integration of blockchain technology into poker platforms has been a game-changer, ensuring a level of fairness and transparency that was previously unattainable. By utilizing blockchain, poker platforms can create a decentralized and tamper-proof environment where all transactions and game outcomes are recorded on a public ledger. This not only prevents any form of cheating or manipulation but also provides players with the assurance that the games they are participating in are fair and transparent. Card games, particularly poker, have always been susceptible to issues of trust and fairness. However, with blockchain technology, these concerns are effectively addressed. The immutable nature of blockchain ensures that all game data is securely stored and cannot be altered, providing players with a level of confidence that is essential in the world of online gaming. As a result, blockchain technology is playing a key role in transforming the poker industry, paving the way for a more secure and trustworthy gaming experience. The intersection of cryptocurrency and poker represents a new era in the gaming industry, characterized by innovation, security, and global accessibility. Crypto poker platforms have revolutionized the way players engage with the game, offering a level of privacy and efficiency that is unmatched by traditional platforms. The use of Bitcoin and Ethereum as preferred currencies has further enhanced the online poker experience, providing players with a reliable and secure means of conducting transactions. Blockchain technology has been instrumental in ensuring fair play and transparency in poker, addressing long-standing concerns about trust and security. By leveraging the power of blockchain, poker platforms can offer players a level of assurance that is crucial in the world of online gaming. As the popularity of cryptocurrency continues to grow, its influence on the poker industry is set to expand, ushering in a new era of gaming that is both exciting and transformative. In conclusion, the fusion of cryptocurrency and poker is reshaping the gaming landscape, offering players a unique and innovative experience. As more platforms embrace digital currencies and blockchain technology, the future of poker looks promising, with endless possibilities for growth and development. This new era of gaming is not only revolutionizing how players engage with poker but is also setting the stage for a more secure, transparent, and exciting gaming experience. The post Exploring the Intersection of Cryptocurrency and Poker: A New Era in Gaming appeared first on Times Tabloid .

Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: China plans to restructure its monetary policies to encourage domestic consumption
Î≥∏Î¨∏: According to a report from the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee meeting held on December 9, China plans to change its monetary policies to improve economic growth and boost domestic consumption. The meeting was held after the Chinese National Bureau of Statistics released the inflation report, which indicated a slowdown in economic growth in the country. In the meeting, the Beijing administration promised to loosen monetary policies while being more proactive in its fiscal stimulus measures. The Politburo, a body led by Chinese President Xi Jinping, also revealed other top priorities for the government in the coming year to improve the economy. The meeting, presided by Xi Jinping, first aimed to analyze the current economic performance. The report added that the performance review would pave the way for policy implementation for 2025. The Beijing administration also discussed the economic growth target for 2025 during the meeting while also planning the country‚Äôs budget. The body‚Äôs policy changes will further aid its advisory decisions with other sectors, including the parliament, of their future decisions. The Politburo decision to initiate fiscal policy changes is the first since 2010, marking over 14 years since the last policy changes in the country. In late 2010, the body initiated policy changes after another change after the 2008 global financial crisis. Despite the Beijing administration not initiating changes frequently, China remains the second-largest economy globally. China deals with growing economic risks The Politburo confirmed that decreasing inflation has negatively affected the economy‚Äôs growth. The rates in November showed that the country‚Äôs inflation hit a 5-month low, with China‚Äôs consumer price index rising by only 0.2% year-on-year. The consumer price index also dropped by 0.6% month-on-month, compared to October‚Äôs 0.3% drop. Many analysts outlined the possibility of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump triggering trade wars. Trump has vocalized his tariff plans, which would hit China, Mexico, and Canada the most. The risk of economic instability caused by Trump‚Äôs tariffs has been one of the greatest contributors to the country‚Äôs slow economic growth. The risks have further created instability in some of the country‚Äôs sectors, especially the housing sector, which faces high housing taxes and mortgages. According to Stansberry analyst Brian Tycangco, China expects the current policy shifts to create more stability in stocks and housing. The analyst also outlined the possibility of an increase in RRR cuts, a reduction in personal tax cuts, and a better focus on direct fiscal stimulus. Tycangco added that the policies would further try to maintain growth in all departments in the country, increasing all-rounded domestic demand. Analysts bank on a 5% economic growth target A Reuters report outlined that Beijing administration advisers are encouraging the government to adopt 5% as the economic growth target for 2025. The report also highlighted that the advisors believe focusing on fiscal stimulus will help the country better manage the effects of Trump‚Äôs tariffs. Goldman Sachs has suggested that implementing a 20% tariff on Chinese imports would weigh the country‚Äôs GDP by 7%. The report also pointed out a Reuters poll, which revealed that many analysts project that the Beijing administration will stick to a 5% economic growth target for 2025. Another poll suggested that China would get about 4.5% in economic growth in the coming year. The report insisted that the projected range by most analysts was between 4% and 5%. Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Breaking: MicroStrategy Acquires 21,550 Bitcoin in Latest Purchase
Î≥∏Î¨∏: MicroStrategy has made another significant move in its Bitcoin accumulation strategy, purchasing 21,550 BTC for approximately $2.1 billion, according to an official filing on Monday . The acquisition, conducted between December 2 and December 8, was executed at an average price of $98,783 per Bitcoin. With this latest purchase, the business intelligence giant now holds a total of 423,650 BTC, valued at around $42 billion. MicroStrategy‚Äôs Fifth Consecutive Week of Bitcoin Purchase The latest acquisition marks the firm‚Äôs fifth consecutive week of Bitcoin investments. Just last week, MicroStrategy acquired 15,400 BTC for $1.5 billion at an average price of $95,976 per coin. The company financed the recent transaction through the sale of approximately 5.4 million shares of its common stock, part of a broader $21 billion equity offering authorized in October 2024. MicroStrategy plans to raise $42 billion over the next three years, with the funding split evenly between equity and fixed-income securities. Of this, $9.19 billion worth of shares remains available for future sales. Co-founder and executive chairman Michael Saylor revealed that the firm‚Äôs Bitcoin holdings were acquired at an average cost of $60,324 per BTC, totaling $25.6 billion, including fees. The company‚Äôs Bitcoin Yield has reached 68.7% year-to-date as of December 9. MicroStrategy has acquired 21,550 BTC for ~$2.1 billion at ~$98,783 per #bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 43.2% QTD and 68.7% YTD. As of 12/8/2024, we hodl 423,650 $BTC acquired for ~$25.6 billion at ~$60,324 per bitcoin. $MSTR https://t.co/8r7bFqMFof ‚Äî Michael Saylor (@saylor) December 9, 2024 Amazon to Consider Bitcoin Investment Just today, the National Center for Public Policy Research, a Washington, D.C.-based think tank advocating for free-market principles, called on Amazon to consider adopting a Bitcoin-focused corporate treasury strategy. In its submission to Amazon, the think tank raised concerns over inflation‚Äôs impact on corporate reserves. It criticized the Consumer Price Index (CPI), which currently estimates inflation at 4.95%, as a ‚Äúremarkably poor measure‚Äù of actual currency debasement. The organization suggested that the real inflation rate could be significantly higher, potentially double the official CPI figure. The proposal is set to be discussed at the company‚Äôs April 2025 shareholder meeting. The NCPPR‚Äôs proposal aligns with a broader push for institutional Bitcoin adoption. In October, it urged Microsoft to invest in Bitcoin through a similar letter. However, Microsoft advised shareholders to reject it , stating management already evaluates such matters. The proposal will be discussed this week at Microsoft‚Äôs annual meeting on December 10. Last week, Bitcoin‚Äôs price dip to $92,957 spurred major acquisitions by BlackRock and MARA Holdings, who collectively purchased 9,173 Bitcoin. BlackRock made the most significant move, purchasing 7,750 Bitcoin. This acquisition pushed the asset management giant‚Äôs total Bitcoin holdings to $48.9 billion. Bitcoin miner MARA Holdings added 1,423 Bitcoin in four transactions between December 5 and 6, valued at $139.5 million. The acquisitions came after the firm closed its second $850 million convertible note offering, earmarked for boosting Bitcoin reserves. MARA now holds 22,108 Bitcoin worth $2.17 billion, reflecting a staggering 162% increase in its holdings compared to last month. Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Why XRP Is Going Down: 8% Drop Explained!
Î≥∏Î¨∏: The post Why XRP Is Going Down: 8% Drop Explained! appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP, the cryptocurrency closely associated with Ripple, experienced a sharp 8% drop today, bringing its price down to $2.36 . This unexpected dip, the steepest in over two months, has left investors puzzled, especially as the token remains near its all-time highs. So, what triggered this bearish momentum? Ripple CEO‚Äôs Missed Opportunity? A major factor behind XRP‚Äôs decline seems to be Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse‚Äôs recent appearance on CBS‚Äôs 60 Minutes . While the interview tackled some of Ripple‚Äôs challenges, it conspicuously omitted a critical point: a Federal Judge‚Äôs ruling that XRP is not a security. This omission did not sit well with the crypto community. Garlinghouse himself expressed frustration, calling it a missed opportunity to shed light on Ripple‚Äôs ongoing legal battles. Following the broadcast, XRP‚Äôs price plummeted by 8%, hitting $2.35 within a single day. Liquidations Add More Pressure XRP‚Äôs drop became even worse due to a surge in liquidations. In the past 24 hours, over $14.5 million worth of long positions on XRP were liquidated . This was part of a broader $358 million sell-off across the crypto market, which triggered a ripple effect, pushing prices down further. Increased market activity was evident as XRP‚Äôs trading volume soared to $12 billion within the last day. However, the selling pressure also dragged XRP‚Äôs market capitalization below $136 billion, pushing it behind Tether (USDT) in the cryptocurrency rankings. Another contributing factor is profit-taking . Many investors appear to be cashing in after XRP‚Äôs strong rally earlier in November. Additionally, market attention is shifting towards Bitcoin and Ethereum, further reducing demand for XRP. Curious about where XRP is headed? Read our long term XRP price prediction to uncover insights on potential breakouts and future trends! Can XRP Recover? Key Levels to Watch From a technical perspective , XRP has fallen below critical support levels, including $2.45. This suggests the potential for further short-term declines. However, there are glimmers of hope for the token. Currently hovering around the 23.6% Fibonacci retracement level at $2.33, XRP could find support at this zone. Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Venture Capitalists Question Crypto's Role in AI Disruption
Î≥∏Î¨∏: The intersection of cryptocurrency and artificial intelligence is rapidly emerging as a focal point for technological innovation and investment. However, recent developments highlight the complexities and debates shaping these industries. At a major conference in Prague, venture capitalists expressed skepticism over the ability of crypto projects to disrupt established AI leaders, emphasizing the need for practical use cases. Meanwhile, in the United States, President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs appointment of David Sacks as the presumptive White House AI and Crypto Czar has sparked discussions about the future of AI governance, decentralization, and the role of blockchain in reshaping these sectors. Crypto and AI: Venture Capitalists Express Skepticism on Decentralized Disruption in the AI Space The intersection of cryptocurrency and artificial intelligence (AI) has ignited significant interest and investment, with retail investors and venture capitalists (VCs) alike pouring resources into innovative projects. However, skepticism remains among key figures in the VC world about the potential of crypto projects to meaningfully disrupt dominant AI players in the current cycle. Speaking at the Emergence conference in Prague, two prominent venture capitalists outlined both their doubts and the nuanced opportunities for blockchain and AI integration. Rob Hadick, a general partner at the crypto-focused VC firm Dragonfly, addressed a recurring issue he sees in the crypto industry: the tendency to ‚Äùput things on-chain‚Äù without improving upon their off-chain counterparts. ‚ÄúCrypto has a problem of taking things that exist really, really well off-chain, making them worse, putting them on-chain, and selling them to people who are already on-chain,‚Äù Hadick remarked. This criticism was not limited to AI but spanned various narratives in the blockchain space. According to Hadick, many current AI-crypto crossover projects fail to justify their existence, often lacking the critical product-market fit necessary to compete with centralized AI leaders such as OpenAI, Microsoft, and Anthropic. Despite this skepticism, both Hadick and David Pakman, managing director at CoinFund, acknowledged the transformative potential AI holds for the broader crypto ecosystem. Pakman highlighted that AI could play a pivotal role in enhancing developer productivity‚Äîa key factor in the resource-intensive world of blockchain development. ‚ÄùAI is a massive software, technical revolution,‚Äù Pakman stated. ‚ÄùWe're building a lot of software in Web3, and we should benefit from the use of AI in a bunch of different decentralized applications, both in infrastructure and security and the way user apps behave.‚Äù In this context, AI‚Äôs utility lies in streamlining the development of decentralized applications (dApps), fortifying blockchain infrastructure, and enhancing security protocols. Pakman‚Äôs perspective focuses on the idea that, while crypto may not fundamentally disrupt AI giants, it can still leverage AI to refine its ecosystem. The Challenge of Decentralized AI Models The conversation turned to whether decentralized AI systems could compete with highly centralized entities. Both panelists expressed doubts that this would be feasible in the current cycle, primarily due to the immense compute resources and infrastructure required to train large-scale AI models. ‚ÄùWe‚Äôve been really skeptical of this idea that there's going to be a market around things like decentralized training or doing anything around models on-chain,‚Äù said Hadick. He noted that Dragonfly‚Äôs investments in this space were limited to niche applications, such as edge computing for latency-insensitive workloads. Pakman echoed this sentiment but emphasized the importance of exploring alternatives to the centralized AI landscape. ‚ÄùIf we want a future of highly centralized AI, we should continue on the current path we‚Äôre on,‚Äù Pakman said. ‚ÄùBut if we want an alternate future, where compute resources to train really large AI models are more decentralized and democratically distributed for access, then we should talk about the wonderful ways Web3 decentralizes access to a tech stack or hardware.‚Äù While the panelists were critical of many current AI-crypto projects, they acknowledged the value of ongoing experimentation in the space. They praised builders who are laying the groundwork for decentralized alternatives, particularly those who are leveraging blockchain to democratize access to compute resources and technical infrastructure. Projects focusing on local AI models and decentralized hardware solutions‚Äîsuch as blockchain-based marketplaces for GPU resources‚Äîwere highlighted as promising directions. While these initiatives may not rival the central AI powerhouses in the short term, they represent a step toward a more equitable technological future. Both Hadick and Pakman urged crypto builders to ‚Äùfollow the incentives‚Äù rather than attempting to replicate centralized AI capabilities. According to Hadick, the focus should be on solving tangible problems where blockchain technology offers clear advantages, rather than forcing AI solutions into a decentralized framework without a compelling use case. The AI-crypto crossover remains a dynamic frontier, full of both potential and pitfalls. While the current cycle may not see decentralized AI systems dethrone industry titans, the ongoing integration of AI into the blockchain space is poised to yield meaningful advancements in efficiency, security, and accessibility. As Pakman concluded, the future of AI in Web3 lies not in competing with centralized behemoths, but in complementing the ecosystem with tools and systems that align with blockchain‚Äôs core values of decentralization and accessibility. Whether this vision will materialize in the next cycle remains an open question‚Äîbut the groundwork is being laid today. David Sacks Named Trump‚Äôs AI and Crypto Czar: A Bold Move Amid AI Industry Tensions In other AI news, United States president-elect Donald Trump has named David Sacks, a veteran tech executive and member of the illustrious ‚ÄúPayPal Mafia,‚Äù as the presumptive ‚ÄùWhite House AI and Crypto Czar.‚Äù The announcement, made via Trump‚Äôs Truth Social account on Dec. 5, has sent ripples through the cryptocurrency and artificial intelligence (AI) sectors, sparking debate over Sacks‚Äô controversial views and deep connections to prominent figures such as Elon Musk. Sacks‚Äô appointment was met with a wave of enthusiasm from the cryptocurrency community, where he is celebrated as a staunch supporter of Solana and a multi-coin investor. Known for his forward-thinking approach to blockchain and decentralized finance, Sacks has long been a proponent of policies that encourage innovation in the crypto space while reducing regulatory bottlenecks. His leadership is expected to bring renewed focus to crypto-friendly legislation and initiatives, a sentiment echoed by several prominent industry voices. One notable supporter, Ryan Selkis, former CEO of the Messari cryptocurrency exchange, chimed in with a sarcastic remark on X, ‚ÄúThis makes me so happy,‚Äù accompanied by a meme. While Selkis‚Äô tone might hint at skepticism, the broader crypto community seems optimistic about Sacks' ability to steer US policy toward crypto innovation. Sacks‚Äô influence on the AI industry is equally notable, albeit more polarizing. He has consistently championed open-source AI solutions and a hands-off regulatory approach, arguing that self-regulation is vital for the sector's growth. While this perspective has garnered support from tech entrepreneurs wary of government overreach, it has also raised concerns among those who advocate for stricter controls to prevent misuse of AI technologies. Sacks‚Äô strong stance on AI regulation aligns closely with that of Elon Musk, with whom he shares both a professional history and a critical view of OpenAI‚Äôs business practices. Musk, who co-founded OpenAI as a nonprofit organization in 2015, has been vocal about his disapproval of the company‚Äôs subsequent pivot to a for-profit model under CEO Sam Altman . At the heart of the tension lies OpenAI‚Äôs controversial restructuring, which has drawn criticism from Musk and other industry figures, including Sacks. Initially established as a nonprofit research organization, OpenAI introduced a ‚Äùfor-profit branch‚Äù to support its monetized operations and scale its efforts in artificial intelligence development. This shift has been met with legal challenges, most notably from Musk‚Äôs AI company, xAI, which filed a lawsuit in California to block the for-profit pivot. The legal battle intensified on Dec. 2, when Musk‚Äôs lawyers filed a motion to halt OpenAI‚Äôs transition while the case proceeds. On an October episode of the All-In Podcast, Sacks and guest Mark Cuban expressed their disapproval of OpenAI‚Äôs actions. Sacks accused the company of betraying its philanthropic roots, stating, ‚ÄúOpenAI tricked Musk into investing in what was thought to be a philanthropic endeavor.‚Äù Cuban echoed this sentiment, adding, ‚ÄúWhen people f--- over investors, it always comes back. Karma is a bitch in business, too.‚Äù Musk, Altman, and a Social Media Drama The drama surrounding Sacks‚Äô appointment took a lighthearted turn on social media, where Musk and Altman exchanged veiled jabs. After Altman publicly congratulated Sacks on X, Musk responded with a laughing-crying emoji, a gesture that many interpreted as a sarcastic critique of Altman‚Äôs leadership. The exchange prompted reactions from industry insiders, including Selkis, whose tongue-in-cheek commentary added another layer of intrigue to the unfolding saga. As Sacks prepares to take on his new role, his appointment signals a potentially transformative era for AI and crypto policy in the United States. His support for open-source AI and blockchain technology suggests a commitment to fostering innovation, albeit with minimal government intervention. However, his criticisms of centralized entities like OpenAI and his ties to Musk could complicate his ability to navigate the broader AI landscape, particularly as tensions between centralized and decentralized models continue to escalate. For the crypto community, Sacks‚Äô leadership may bring a much-needed ally in Washington, one who understands the unique challenges and opportunities facing the industry. Yet, his views on AI regulation could put him at odds with policymakers advocating for greater oversight, setting the stage for a contentious tenure.

Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: How Do Traditional Payment Methods Compare to Crypto in Casinos?
Î≥∏Î¨∏: Money might not grow on trees, but in the online casino world, it sure flows through all kinds of pipes. Whether you‚Äôre spinning the slots or doubling down on blackjack, how you move your cash matters. In Zambia, the payment options for online casinos are growing faster than a 90s dial-up modem. Traditional methods are still leading the pack but crypto emerges as the new kid on the block. But how do these options stack up? Let‚Äôs break it down The Tried-and-True: Traditional Payment Methods For years, Zambian players have relied on mobile money and bank cards. Airtel Money, MTN Mobile Money, and Kazang are household names, offering quick, reliable ways to deposit and withdraw. They‚Äôre user-friendly, widely accepted, and perfect for players who value simplicity. And let‚Äôs be honest ‚Äì most online casinos, including the ever-popular Betway Casino , practically roll out the red carpet for these options. But let‚Äôs not ignore the quirks. While deposits are usually a breeze, withdrawals can sometimes take longer than you‚Äôd like. Nothing kills a Friday night vibe faster than waiting on your jackpot to process. Plus, some methods sneak in transaction fees, making those winnings feel a little lighter. Still, for most players, the familiarity and ease of use make these methods the go-to choice. Crypto: The Flashy New Contender Enter cryptocurrencies ‚Äì the cool new kid in town, rocking Bitcoin wallets and Ethereum chains. These digital currencies are bringing lightning-fast transactions and lower fees to the table. Imagine cashing out your winnings in minutes instead of hours. That‚Äôs the kind of speed we‚Äôre talking about here. On top of that, crypto comes with the added bonus of privacy. Thanks to blockchain technology, your financial details are locked down tighter than your grandma‚Äôs cookie jar. But, as with any shiny new tech, there are trade-offs. First, not every casino is ready to embrace crypto just yet. Many platforms catering to Zambian players haven‚Äôt fully integrated digital currencies. This will limit your options. And then there‚Äôs the volatility. Crypto values can swing wildly ‚Äì your winnings might be worth a fortune today and lunch money tomorrow. Add to that the regulatory uncertainty in Zambia, and it‚Äôs clear that while crypto is exciting, it‚Äôs not for the faint of heart. Head-to-Head: Traditional vs. Crypto So, how do these two payment giants measure up? When it comes to speed, crypto takes the crown. Transactions take minutes, while traditional methods ‚Äì especially withdrawals ‚Äì can take days. Fees also lean in crypto‚Äôs favour, with most transactions costing far less than bank or mobile money transfers. However, traditional methods win in terms of accessibility and acceptance. They‚Äôre everywhere, familiar, and backed by solid regulations ‚Äì something crypto can‚Äôt yet claim. For Zambian players, Betway Casino is a household name. It‚Äôs the kind of platform that makes gambling easy, with support for popular local payment options like Airtel Money and MTN Mobile Money. Whether you‚Äôre depositing a quick 10 ZMW for some weekend fun or cashing out your big win, the process is smooth and straightforward. While crypto isn‚Äôt on their roster yet, Betway has a reputation for staying ahead of trends, so who knows what the future holds? Which Option is Right for You? Here‚Äôs the deal: if you value speed and lower fees, crypto is worth exploring. It‚Äôs a bold choice, great for tech-savvy players ready to embrace the future. If you prefer the comfort of tried-and-true methods, traditional payment systems are still your best bet. As the gambling world continues to evolve, keeping up with payment innovations is part of the fun. Whether you‚Äôre sticking with the classics or dipping your toes into crypto, choose what works best for you. If the bulls display strength, then the price is believed to break the range and enter the resistance zone between $247.78 and $249.59. A rise above the range is expected if the bulls display strength and if the market sentiments turn extremely bullish, then the Solana (SOL) price rally is expected to mark a new ATH close to $275.

Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Pundit Says Why Can‚Äôt Shiba Inu Reach $0.01 if Bitcoin Can Reach $1M
Î≥∏Î¨∏: In a bold tweet, Lola, a prominent commentator within the Shiba Inu community, sparked a conversation about the potential future of Shiba Inu (SHIB). She drew comparisons to Bitcoin and posed a thought-provoking question: If Bitcoin can reach $1 million per coin, why can‚Äôt Shiba Inu reach $0.01?Notably, prominent industry leaders have argued for a future where Bitcoin could be worth $1 million per coin. Attaining $0.01 would require Shiba Inu‚Äôs price to increase by 332-fold or 33,233%.¬†Market analysts have largely dismissed the possibility of Shiba Inu reaching $0.01 , mainly due to its extensive circulating supply. However, as SHIB‚Äôs price increases, the need for high-volume revenue-generating activities to support continued burns becomes even more significant.She pointed to developments within the XRP ecosystem, where the incoming Ripple stablecoin will burn XRP with transactions, which enthusiasts see as a bullish factor. Lola cited this as a prime example of how burn mechanisms can enhance the value of a token.Propositions for SHIB $0.01 DreamAccordingly, Lola speculated that platforms like Robinhood could create Layer 2 (L2) solutions to avoid future regulatory issues and use SHIB as their gas token, helping the price soar.In this hypothetical scenario, Robinhood adopting SHIB as the gas for transactions within their L2 could be a step toward mass adoption and usage of SHIB in a more mainstream context.Ultimately, whether SHIB can reach $0.01 remains to be seen. Proponents believe that with the right combination of deflationary mechanics, increased adoption, and institutional integration, the path forward could be more promising than many think.

Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Donald Trump‚Äôs first 100 days in office: Where does crypto fit in in his top 5 priorities?
Î≥∏Î¨∏: The global community and the crypto industry are eagerly anticipating the first day of Trump‚Äôs presidency, but previewing his first 100 days could provide a more revealing picture. According to Trump‚Äôs campaign manifesto, his government could significantly impact the relationships between the world and the United States. One of his most popular promises was his pledge to establish the United States as the center of crypto, and the industry is eager. Behind the scenes, a team of senior aides and prospective White House officials are formulating their initial policy initiatives to fulfill the president-elect‚Äôs campaign promises.¬†There is a fervent commitment within his camp to speedily and effectively implement the president-elect‚Äôs vision in comparison to his first term. Trump‚Äôs top five priorities About trade, Trump is committed to imposing 25% tariffs on all products imported from Mexico and Canada on his first day in office in January unless those countries satisfactorily stop the flow of illegal drugs such as fentanyl into the United States and illegal immigration. Additionally, he has issued threats to impose supplementary tariffs on China until it implements measures to reduce fentanyl production. However, Trump stated that he is unable to guarantee that the tariffs he has promised to impose on key U.S. foreign trade partners will not increase prices for American consumers. On taxes and budgets, Trump made assurances regarding tax policy to both businesses and individuals. Among other things, tax reductions on tipped income, overtime pay, some Social Security taxes, tax reductions for first responders and the military, and Americans residing abroad, as well as deductions for auto loan interest. In addition, the 2017 Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (TCJA) provisions that are about to expire will almost probably be extended, though there will likely be a long fight over some important details. Trump will put in place big new taxes, though they might not be as strong at first as he said he would be during the campaign. On border and immigration, the incoming administration is set to implement strict border measures, strike down Biden-era policies, and initiate the detention and deportation of migrants on a large scale. Immigration was a central focus of President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs 2024 presidential campaign. However, unlike his initial campaign, which was primarily focused on the construction of a border wall, Trump has shifted his focus to interior enforcement and the removal of undocumented immigrants who are already in the United States. On retribution and the deep state, Trump issued over 100 threats to investigate, prosecute, and imprison his perceived adversaries, including political opponents and private citizens, during the 2024 presidential campaign. Trump was attacked during his campaign by entities dubbed as the deep state. These are people who perceive themselves to be above the law. Photo of Donald Trump with his right fist in the air after an assassination attempt during a campaign stop in Pennsylvania. Trump‚Äôs opponents anticipate that the president-elect may implement a policy of ‚Äúretribution,‚Äù as he phrased it. On foreign policy , Trump indicated a return to his ‚ÄúAmerica First‚Äù foreign policy, which was characterized by a decrease in international collaboration and an increase in isolationism. However, this did not prevent Trump from claiming his ability to end Russia‚Äôs war against Ukraine within 24 hours of assuming office, bring peace to the Middle East, and exert dominance over China, one of the United States‚Äô largest geopolitical rivals. Crypto‚Äôs position in the Trump government Crypto is a priority for the incoming government, just not the most urgent on the agenda. However, there are several things Trump has established in favor of the crypto industry. He has verbally supported crypto during his campaign. He noted, ‚ÄúThe United States will be the Crypto Capital of the Planet and Bitcoin superpower of the world.‚Äù This statement caused Bitcoin to take off on a parable trajectory. He has also established a crypto-friendly administration. DJT appointed a pro-crypto Vice President-elect in JD Vance. He also nominated Paul Atkins as SEC chairman, a co-chairman of the Token Alliance at the Digital Chamber, a prominent blockchain trade association, and a crypto advocate that the crypto industry loves. The price of Bitcoin surpassed $100,000 soon after Atkins‚Äôs nomination. DJT then congratulated the crypto community, saying, ‚ÄúCongratulations Bitcoiners!!! $100,000!!! You‚Äôre welcome!!!‚Äù Screenshot of a post from President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs Truth Social account. Donald Trump has demonstrated his influence on the crypto industry, and his first 100 days in office could still push it to new heights even if it may not be on his to-do list on day one. Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: TON-Based Tap-to-Earn Games Struggle with Retention Due to Repetitive Gameplay
Î≥∏Î¨∏: Despite a bullish cryptocurrency market, TON-based tap-to-earn games are grappling with significant user retention challenges. According to a recent report by BeInCrypto, leading games such as Hamster Kombat, Notcoin, and Catizen have witnessed a sharp decline in active users. Specifically, active wallets on the TON blockchain have plummeted from over 1 million in September to less than 500,000 by December. A Chainplay survey further highlights that repetitive gameplay is the primary reason behind this downturn, with over 51% of players citing monotonous tasks as their main reason for quitting. Decline in User Engagement The rapid decrease in active wallets within the TON blockchain indicates a broader issue of declining user engagement across tap-to-earn platforms. Despite the overall positive sentiment in the cryptocurrency market, these games are unable to maintain a steady user base, leading to concerns about the sustainability of the tap-to-earn model on Telegram-based platforms. Key Statistics: Active Wallets Drop: From 1 million in September to less than 500,000 by December. User Retention Issues: Over 51% of surveyed players quit due to repetitive tasks. Leading Games Affected: Hamster Kombat, Notcoin, and Catizen among the most impacted. Repetitive Gameplay: The Core Issue A significant factor contributing to the decline in user retention is the repetitive nature of gameplay . Tap-to-earn games often rely on simple, repetitive tasks to reward players with cryptocurrency or in-game assets. While this model initially attracts users with the promise of easy earnings, the lack of variety and engaging content quickly leads to player fatigue and boredom. Insights from Chainplay Report The Chainplay survey sheds light on player dissatisfaction, revealing that: Monotonous Tasks: A majority of players find the repetitive nature of tasks unengaging. Lack of Incentives: Insufficient rewards or progression systems fail to motivate sustained participation. Gameplay Variety: Limited diversity in game mechanics reduces long-term appeal. Impact on TON Blockchain Ecosystem The decline in user engagement within tap-to-earn games has broader implications for the TON blockchain ecosystem . As these games are significant drivers of transaction volume and blockchain utilization, their downturn can affect the overall health and growth prospects of the TON network. Economic Implications: Reduced Transaction Volume: Fewer active users translate to lower transaction activity on the blockchain. Investment Concerns: Declining user engagement may deter new investments and partnerships within the TON ecosystem. Developer Challenges: Game developers may struggle to innovate and attract players without a substantial user base. Strategies to Improve Retention To address the retention challenges, developers and platform operators need to implement strategies that enhance user engagement and diversify gameplay experiences. 1. Introducing Game Variety Incorporating diverse game mechanics and challenges can keep players engaged for longer periods. Features such as missions, quests, and varying levels of difficulty can add depth to the gameplay experience. 2. Enhanced Reward Systems Developing more robust reward systems that offer meaningful incentives can motivate players to continue participating. This could include tiered rewards, exclusive in-game items, or higher earnings potential for consistent play. 3. Community Building Fostering a strong community around tap-to-earn games can enhance player loyalty. Interactive features such as leaderboards, tournaments, and social events can create a sense of belonging and competition among players. 4. Continuous Content Updates Regularly updating the game with new content, features, and challenges can prevent the gameplay from becoming stale. Seasonal events, limited-time challenges, and new game modes can keep the experience fresh and exciting. Future Outlook While TON-based tap-to-earn games are currently facing retention issues, the potential for recovery and growth remains if strategic measures are effectively implemented. The increasing interest in blockchain gaming and the evolving nature of the cryptocurrency market present opportunities for these platforms to reinvent themselves and better cater to player preferences. Potential Developments: Integration of NFTs: Incorporating non-fungible tokens (NFTs) can add unique value to in-game assets, enhancing player ownership and investment. Cross-Platform Compatibility: Expanding beyond Telegram to other platforms can increase accessibility and user reach. Advanced Gamification: Leveraging advanced gamification techniques can create more engaging and interactive gameplay experiences. Conclusion The decline in user retention among TON-based tap-to-earn games highlights the critical need for innovation and diversification in the blockchain gaming sector. Repetitive gameplay and lack of engaging content are major hurdles that need to be addressed to sustain and grow the user base. By implementing strategic enhancements such as varied game mechanics, robust reward systems, and community-building initiatives, tap-to-earn platforms on the TON blockchain can overcome current challenges and pave the way for a more vibrant and sustainable gaming ecosystem. As the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, the success of tap-to-earn models will depend on their ability to adapt and offer meaningful, engaging experiences to users. Developers and platform operators must prioritize creativity and user-centric design to ensure long-term viability and growth within this competitive market. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Ancient Dogecoin Whale With 870K DOGE Reawakens After 11 Years as DOGE Slumps 5%
Î≥∏Î¨∏: An ancient Dogecoin whale address has reactivated after eleven years of dormancy amid a recent pullback in the DOGE price. Whale Alert, a prominent whale-tracking resource, first called the public‚Äôs attention to the recent development. The analytical platform confirmed in a recent post that the whale initially held a balance of 870,019 DOGE. Whale Alert on X Whale Alert on X The distribution campaign, which began on Dec. 7 at 11:41 UTC, started with the offloading of 50,000 DOGE. Further, the whale moved an additional 100,000 DOGE tokens and then transferred several batches of 67,500 tokens. After this, it then moved out 450,000 DOGE.Possible DOGE SelloffInterestingly, the address sent all the assets, totaling 870,000 tokens, to Coinbase, America‚Äôs largest crypto exchange. This move was likely an effort toward cashing out on his investment after eleven years of holding the assets.¬†However, the latest development has had very minimal impact on the Dogecoin market, as DOGE remains largely unperturbed. Despite this, the market is currently down as the asset has slumped 5% over the past 24 hours due to a broader crypto market collapse.¬†On-chain data shows that the address began accumulating Dogecoin in its early days. Notably, the wallet received the 870K tokens between December 2013, about two weeks after the launch of Dogecoin, and January 2014.¬†The address received the assets in several uneven batches, with the first inflow involving 67,500 DOGE on Dec. 21, 2013. Afterward, the wallet then witnessed three more batches of 67,500 tokens as inflows across several minutes on the same day.At the time of the transactions between December 2013 and January 2014, Dogecoin traded at an average price of $0.0007. This indicates that the tokens were procured with a meager $609. Eleven years later, the whale has now dissolved the investment at a price of $391,889, representing an ROI of 64,249%.Dogecoin Eyes Second PushThis massive return comes despite Dogecoin‚Äôs recent pullback. Notably, market analysts insist that the meme coin is still on the verge of another parabolic upsurge. A prominent analyst Kevin believes the next leg will come up soon, with targets at $3.8 to $4.Interestingly, while this address dumped, larger investors have been accumulating more tokens in anticipation of this upsurge. For instance, late last month, some whales procured 550 million DOGE tokens amid a price drop. Another set of addresses amassed 160 million tokens in mid-November.¬†Meanwhile, Dogecoin has held above the pivotal $0.40 psychological support amid the ongoing market correction. The meme coin is down 5.92% over the past 24 hours, currently trading for $0.4345 at press time.

Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: Bitcoin Surge Toward $100K Faces Offload Pressure, Potential Bearish Turn Looms
Î≥∏Î¨∏: Bitcoin rapid ascent towards the $100,000 mark is being met with an increasing wave of selling from long-term holders, a development that has some analysts concerned about a potential market peak. As the cryptocurrency nears its historic price threshold, a shift in market dynamics could soon catch traders offside, especially if the current buy-side demand begins to fade. Long-term Holders Cashing Out According to data from CryptoQuant contributor Maartuun, long-term holders ‚Äî defined as wallets that have held Bitcoin for over 155 days ‚Äî have sold an alarming 827,783 BTC since November 8. At Bitcoin‚Äôs current price of approximately $99,200, this amounts to roughly $82.6 billion in offloads. This large-scale selling has sparked concerns that the market may be reaching a top, especially given that these holders are sitting on significant unrealized profits, with an average gain of around 400%. Retail Demand and ETF Inflows Keep Bitcoin Strong While prominent buyers like MicroStrategy and Bitcoin ETFs have added to their holdings ‚Äî with MicroStrategy purchasing 149,800 BTC and ETFs seeing 84,193 BTC inflows over the same period ‚Äî Maartuun points out that these inflows represent only a fraction (roughly 30%) of the sell-offs by long-term holders. ‚ÄúThe overall market is much larger than just them,‚Äù Maartuun said, adding that retail traders, particularly those involved in Bitcoin futures, are also playing a significant role in the market‚Äôs current dynamics. Bitcoin‚Äôs Open Interest (OI), which tracks the total number of unsettled derivative contracts, stood at a hefty $61.2 billion as of early December. Profit-Taking and Liquidity Concerns The growing concern is the impact of long-term holders exiting the market . Many are sitting on massive profits, with Bitcoin‚Äôs Long-Term Holder realized price ‚Äî the average price paid by long-term holders ‚Äî sitting at $24,481. As Bitcoin approaches $100,000, this sell-side pressure could signal a top, particularly if retail demand begins to taper off. Analysts are already sounding the alarm. On December 6, Real Vision‚Äôs chief crypto analyst, Jamie Coutts, pointed to worsening liquidity conditions, which could soon dampen the rally. His Bitcoin MSI macro model suggests that while Bitcoin is hitting all-time highs (ATHs), the market is operating in a deteriorating liquidity environment. If this trend worsens, the current euphoria could soon give way to a downturn, with the rally potentially running out of steam sooner than expected. However, the rally was followed by a sharp 14.84 percent correction , including a rapid 10 percent drop within just eight minutes‚Äîthe largest pullback from a present ATH since the pre-election sell-off. The correction triggered over $1.1 billion in liquidations, of which $419 million were in Bitcoin long positions, underscoring the level of leverage in the market. Despite this volatility, signs of market stabilisation are emerging. The Realized Profit metric , which peaked at $10.5 billion daily, has fallen to $2.5 billion, easing sell-side pressure. Futures funding rates have also normalised, signalling reduced speculative leverage. And while ETF inflows slowed slightly towards the end of last week, they remain a critical source of support amid ongoing long-term holder profit-taking. As Bitcoin consolidates above $100,000, the mid-term outlook remains bullish, and with normalising funding rates and slowing sell-side pressure, further upward momentum is likely, provided ETF inflows continue. However, a slight rise in unemployment to 4.2 percent suggests lingering workforce shifts. October job openings surged to 7.74 million, highlighting sustained demand for labour, although hiring slowed, reflecting employer caution amid economic uncertainties. Meanwhile, the service sector marked its 51st consecutive month of growth in November, though at a slower pace, with the PMI at 52.1, supported by robust consumer spending and wage growth. Inflationary pressures persist, but easing supply chain bottlenecks and strong year-end expectations point to stability. As the Federal Reserve evaluates potential policy shifts from the new incoming administration, the economy remains anchored by a resilient labour market and steady consumer demand. Uneven recovery across sectors however, signal the need for cautious optimism. In crypto news last week, South Korea experienced a dramatic surge in crypto trading , with $34 billion recorded in just 24 hours across leading Korean crypto exchanges, following the declaration of martial law by President Yoon Suk-yeol. Îâ¥Ïä§Ï†úÎ™©: 21Shares‚Äô 2025 Outlook Predicts More Bitcoin Adoption and Ethereum Resurgence
Î≥∏Î¨∏: As the cryptocurrency industry prepares for what could be a transformative year, 21Shares, a leading issuer of crypto exchange-traded products (ETPs), has released its 2025 State of Crypto Market Outlook . The report offers an in-depth analysis of digital asset trends and predicts significant growth in Bitcoin adoption, Ethereum‚Äôs resurgence, and the integration of stablecoins into traditional financial systems. The firm anticipates 2025 as a pivotal year for the sector, driven by increased institutional interest, U.S. regulatory advancements, and favorable macroeconomic conditions. Are you ready for the crypto market in 2025? Explore 12 must-know predictions in the latest State of Crypto: 2025 Market Outlook ‚Äì Available now! https://t.co/rWnOo2GsTO #StateOfCrypto #MarketOutlook2025 #CryptoIndustry pic.twitter.com/5x94JIdeSC ‚Äî 21Shares (@21Shares) December 9, 2024 21Shares Predict More Bitcoin Reserve: Which Countries Are Adopting? The report highlights Bitcoin‚Äôs growing stature as a strategic reserve asset. It projects that more nation-states will follow El Salvador‚Äôs lead in embracing Bitcoin as part of their financial strategy. Argentina is identified as a potential candidate for such adoption. This shift indicates a broader acceptance of Bitcoin‚Äôs role beyond a store of value, as 21Shares predicts the cryptocurrency‚Äôs total value locked (TVL) will exceed $10 billion in 2025. Moreover, according to the report, Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, is also set for a renaissance in 2025. After stagnation, Ethereum‚Äôs revenue growth is expected to rebound significantly, surpassing 100% of its target. The resurgence will be driven by strategic Layer 2 integrations , which will ultimately enhance scalability and utility. Adrian Fritz, Head of Research at 21Shares, emphasized the shifting dynamics in global markets. He noted that while Europe has led the charge in digital asset adoption, the United States is rapidly emerging as a formidable player. ‚ÄúIn 2025, we expect the market to become even more positive towards crypto, spurred by a more favorable regulatory environment under a new administration that will likely accelerate crypto adoption, and growth for the industry at large, at a pace we‚Äôve never seen before.‚Äù Adrian Fritz ETP and Stablecoin Growth Amid War Against Bitcoin Reserve The report also projects explosive growth for crypto ETPs, forecasting assets under management (AUM) to reach $150 billion by 2025. The approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S. and similar regulatory changes worldwide are expected to drive this momentum. With institutional investors showing an increased appetite for regulated exposure to crypto assets, at least one U.S.-based Bitcoin ETF is anticipated to rank among the top 25 largest ETFs globally. Stablecoins , often touted as the bridge between traditional finance and blockchain technology, are another focal point of 21Shares‚Äô outlook. These digital assets are expected to see deeper integration into public and private sectors, with nation-states, banks, and Web2 companies adopting stablecoins for various use cases. Notably, the idea of a country-owned Bitcoin reserve is gaining momentum. On Friday, December 6, a report showed that Florida is exploring the creation of a statewide Bitcoin reserve , aiming for a potential launch in early 2025. While there has been praise, there have also been some cautions. Former US Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers has criticized President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs proposal to establish a national Bitcoin reserve, calling it impractical and politically motivated. Trump‚Äôs plan involves retaining 200,000 Bitcoins from past asset seizures, and advocates suggest it could reduce the national debt through value appreciation. Summers, however, dismissed the idea as a misplaced financial strategy, questioning why the government would accumulate Bitcoin as a ‚Äústerile inventory.‚Äù Former Federal Reserve Bank of New York President Bill Dudley recently criticized the idea , claiming it is a ‚Äúbad deal for Americans.‚Äù The post 21Shares‚Äô 2025 Outlook Predicts More Bitcoin Adoption and Ethereum Resurgence appeared first on Cryptonews .

Whale Accumulation Fuels PEPE‚Äôs Bullish Momentum Data shared by crypto analyst Ali Martinez on social media platform X highlights that PEPE whales recently added $1.14 billion in PEPE to their holdings, pushing the total whale-controlled amount to $7.56 billion. This plays into a bullish run over the weekend, which saw PEPE‚Äôs market cap surpass $10 billion for the first time. At the time of writing, PEPE has a market cap of about $11.17 billion, meaning this holder cohort now controls about 67% of the total market cap. Related Reading: Technical Analysis Puts XRP Price Above $5 In Next 3 Days, Whales Buy $288 Worth Of XRP Interestingly, on-chain data shows the surge in whale accumulation didn‚Äôt just start yesterday. IntoTheBlock‚Äôs Balance By Holdings In USD metric shows a 30-day increase of 147.81% in the holdings of addresses holding more than $10 million worth of PEPE tokens. These large holders have been on an accumulation trend, with a massive $1.14 billion purchase coming in on December 7 alone. Other holder cohorts have also significantly expanded their positions over the past month. Addresses holding between $1 million and $10 million worth of PEPE recorded a 119% increase in their holdings during this period, while those holding between $100,000 and $1 million saw a 108% rise. Mid-tier investors with holdings between $10,000 and $100,000 registered an 84.25% growth in their balances, while even smaller holders with $1,000 to $10,000 worth of PEPE saw their holdings increase by 55.29%. This increase in accumulation from all cohorts has increased the buying pressure on PEPE, which in turn has allowed the meme cryptocurrency to surge in value by 150% in the past 30 days. Exchange Listings And Accessibility Boost PEPE‚Äôs Popularity Another notable driver behind PEPE‚Äôs record-breaking performance is its growing accessibility after listing on major crypto exchanges. PEPE has been added to crypto exchanges like Coinbase, Robinhood, and Binance US in the past few days, which has significantly increased its exposure to retail and institutional investors in the US These listings have made it easier for a broader audience to trade and invest in the meme cryptocurrency. Related Reading: Ethereum Price Breakout: Charting The Uncertain Part Of ETH To $18,000 The impact of these listings has been profound, especially as the industry is currently in a bull phase. At the time of writing, PEPE is trading at $0.00002616, representing a 3.5% increase in the past 24 hours. PEPE‚Äôs bullish trajectory appears set to extend further as whale and retail accumulation continues. Featured image created with Dall.E, chart from Tradingview.com
